mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE menu AS ( /* SystemSetMapper.selectMenuList 메뉴 조회 */ SELECT URL , PARENT_URL , MENU_NAME , 1 AS LEVEL FROM SYSTEM_MENU WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND URL = '/' UNION ALL SELECT A.URL , A.PARENT_URL , A.MENU_NAME , 1 + LEVEL AS LEVEL FROM SYSTEM_MENU A INNER JOIN menu ON A.PARENT_URL = menu.URL WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' ) SELECT URL , PARENT_URL , MENU_NAME , LEVEL FROM menu
